Collection Description: Probability is the study of chance and likelihood. How likely are you to pull the one green apple out of a bag also containing 9 red apples? How many words can you make from the letters in HOMEWORK? What are the odds that your two favorite horses will take first and second in the Kentucky Derby?

Level 3: Additive and Multiplicative Rules for Probability
Simulation of Random Behavior and Probability Distributions
Binomial Distributions and Probability with TI Calculators
Computing Probabilities for the Standard Normal Distribution
Normal Approximation of the Binomial Distribution
Mean and Standard Deviation of Discrete Random Variables
Sums and Differences of Independent Random Variables
